text: Thæ̂cring khả kl̀āw k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā meụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā t̄hūk reīyk r̂xng pị s̄ū̀ xạllxḥˌ læa rx sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ pheụ̄̀x h̄ı̂ tạds̄in rah̄ẁāng phwk k̄heā phwk k̄heā ca kl̀āw ẁā reā dị̂yin læ̂w læa reā cheụ̄̀xfạng pt̩ibạti tām læa chn h̄el̀ā nī̂ phwk k̄heā pĕn p̄hū̂ pras̄b khwām s̄ảrĕc
